title: New: The Cribs – Chi-Town
content:
With their first new material since 2009’s Ignore The Ignorant, The Cribs had their new single Chi-Town premiered on Zane Lowe’s BBC earlier this evening.

As to be expected, it’s a raucous slice of indie-rock, all centered around a killer chorus and Ryan Jarman’s unique vocals. The Cribs fifth studio album In The Belly Of The Brazen Bull will be released on 7 May, with David Fridman and Steve Albini on production duties. Check out Chi-Town below, and the tracklisting below that.

Glitters Like Gold
Come On Be A No-One
Jaded Youth
Anna
Confident Men
Uptight
Chi-Town
Pure O
Back To The Bolthole
I Should Have Helped
Stalagmites
Like A Gift Giver
Butterflies
Arena Rock Encore With Full Cast
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
